# Comandos especiales

- utf8_print("\u03C3")

``` {{markdown}}
"σ"

μ <- abs(digamma(1))
μseq <- seq(μ,3*μ,μ)
dev.new()
plot(μseq, ylab = "Diameter of apeture ( μ m)",
  , xlab = "Force spaces with ~ μ  \u03C0  \u03C3  \u03C0 ",
  , main = "This is another Greek character with space \u03C3")
```
